unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies – Get Your Sunshine Discount!**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies – Get Your Sunshine Discount!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, wanna save some serious Rs. on your electricity bills? Good news! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is still offering subsidies on solar rooftop installations.
normalised: Hey folks, wanna save some serious rupees on your electricity bills? Good news! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is still offering subsidies on solar rooftop installations.

unnormalised: Think about it, free power from the sun! Forget load shedding woes during Diwali!
normalised: Think about it, free power from the sun! Forget load shedding woes during Diwali!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from TERI says these subsidies can cut installation costs by up to 40%, depending on your state and the size of your system. We're talking serious savings, folks!
normalised: Doctor Sharma from T E R I says these subsidies can cut installation costs by up to forty percent, depending on your state and the size of your system. We're talking serious savings, folks!

unnormalised: For example, a 5kW system covering around 500 sq ft of your roof in Bengaluru could get you a substantial discount. The program aims to boost adoption, especially in smaller cities like Patna and Jaipur.
normalised: For example, a five kilowatt system covering around five hundred square feet of your roof in Bengaluru could get you a substantial discount. The program aims to boost adoption, especially in smaller cities like Patna and Jaipur.

unnormalised: Plus, contributing to a greener India is pretty cool, right? So, ditch the guilt trips about your AC and explore the sunny side! Check out your local discom or the MNRE website for details. Don’t miss out, these subsidies are like free mithai – they won't last forever! Apply now.
normalised: Plus, contributing to a greener India is pretty cool, right? So, ditch the guilt trips about your A C and explore the sunny side! Check out your local discom or the M N R E website for details. Don’t miss out, these subsidies are like free mithai – they won't last forever! Apply now.
